title: NCHR to be functional in next three months, Senate told
content:
ISLAMABAD, Feb 10 (APP):Minister for Parliamentary Affairs Azam Khan Swati Monday informed Senate that the National Commission for Human Rights (NCHR) would become
functional within a period of three months.
Responding to the motion of Senator Mushtaq Ahmed, seeking discussion
of House on issue of non-functioning of National Commission for Human Rights
(NCHR) for the last six months, he said the scrutiny of applicants of NCHR
membership was being conducted and the process would be completed within
next few months.
